00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 #define XNRPICK  0x20000000     /* Check RPI state */
00053 
00054 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00062 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00063 
00064 /* Flags for context checking */
00065 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1    /* Regular thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2    /* Interrupt service thread */
00067 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4    /* Nanokernel hook */
00068 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8    /* Root thread */
00069 
00070 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00071 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00072 
00073 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00074 
00075 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00076 
00077 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00078 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00079 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000      /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00080 
00081 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00083 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00084 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00085 
00086 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00087 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00279 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00280     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00281 
00282 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00283     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00284 
00285 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00286     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00287 
00288 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00289     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00290 
00291 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00292     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00293 
00294 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00295     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00296 
00297 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00298     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00299 
00300 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
00301 #define xnpod_current_p(thread)                                 \
00302     ({ int __shadow_p = xnthread_test_state(thread, XNSHADOW);          \
00303        int __curr_p = __shadow_p ? xnshadow_thread(current) == thread   \
00304            : thread == xnpod_current_thread();                          \
00305        __curr_p;})
00306 #else
00307 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00308     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00309 #endif
00310 
00311 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00312     (!!xnthread_test_state(xnpod_current_thread(),XNLOCK))
00313 
00314 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00315     (xnpod_asynch_p() || xnthread_test_state(xnpod_current_thread(),XNROOT))
00316 
00317 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00318     (!!xnthread_test_state(xnpod_current_thread(),XNROOT))
00319 
00320 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00321     (!!xnthread_test_state(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSHADOW))
00322 
00323 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00324     (!!xnthread_test_state(xnpod_current_thread(),XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00325 
00326 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00327     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00328 
00329 #define xnpod_secondary_p()     xnpod_root_p()
00330 
00331 #define xnpod_idle_p()  xnpod_root_p()
00332 
00333 #define xnpod_timeset_p()       (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00335 static inline void xnpod_renice_root(int prio)
00336 {
00337         xnthread_t *rootcb;
00338         spl_t s;
00339 
00340         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);
00341         rootcb = xnpod_current_root();
00342         rootcb->cprio = prio;
00343         xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb, XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO | XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00344         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);
00345 }
00346 
00347 static inline int xnpod_root_priority(void)
00348 {
00349         return xnthread_current_priority(xnpod_current_root());
00350 }
00351 
00352 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir(xnpod_t *pod)
00353 {
00354         /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00355         return testbits(pod->status, XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio(int inprio, int outprio)
00359 {
00360         /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00361            lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00362         int delta = inprio - outprio;
00363         return testbits(nkpod->status, XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00364 }
00365 
00366 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio(int prio)
00367 {
00368         return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00369             nkpod->loprio - prio : nkpod->hiprio - prio - 1;
00370 }
00371 
00372 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec(void)
00373 {
00374         return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00375 }
00376 
00377 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval(void)
00378 {
00379         /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00380         return nkpod->tickvalue;
00381 }
00382 
00383 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns(xnticks_t ticks)
00384 {
00385         /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00386 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00387         return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00388 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00389         return ticks;
00390 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00391 }
00392 
00393 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks(xntime_t t)
00394 {
00395 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00396         return xnarch_ulldiv(t, xnpod_get_tickval(), NULL);
00397 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00398         return t;
00399 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00400 }

00447 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched(void)
00448 {
00449         xnthread_t *runthread = xnpod_current_sched()->runthread;
00450         spl_t s;
00451 
00452         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);
00453 
00454         if (xnthread_lock_count(runthread)++ == 0)
00455                 xnthread_set_state(runthread, XNLOCK);
00456 
00457         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);
00458 }
00459 
00460 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched(void)
00461 {
00462         xnthread_t *runthread = xnpod_current_sched()->runthread;
00463         spl_t s;
00464 
00465         xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock, s);
00466 
00467         if (--xnthread_lock_count(runthread) == 0) {
00468                 xnthread_clear_state(runthread, XNLOCK);
00469                 xnpod_schedule();
00470         }
00471 
00472         xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock, s);
00473 }

00501 static inline void xnpod_yield(void)
00502 {
00503         xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(), 0);
00504         xnpod_schedule();
00505 }

00507 static inline void xnpod_delay(xnticks_t timeout)
00508 {
00509         xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(), XNDELAY, timeout, NULL);
00510 }

00512 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self(void)
00513 {
00514         xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(), XNSUSP, XN_INFINITE, NULL);
00515 }
00516 
00517 static inline void xnpod_delete_self(void)
00518 {
00519         xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
